name: Chronology (itch)
description:
Chronology contains hundreds of events from various categories.

Game modes:
- Single player: Create the correct order of 15 events.
- Multiplayer: You can create or join existing rooms to compete with others.

Chronology contains only general knowledge events.
Thus, this game will present a true test of your level of education!

In this quiz you will find questions from the following categories:

- Geography
- Literature
- Art
- Music
- Movie
- Physics
- Chemistry
- Medicine
- Astronomy
- Technology
- Social Studies
- Religion
- Business
- Sport
- Classic History

Each game of Chronology contains 15 events to sort into the correct order.
The events are hand-selected and are designed to test a wide range of your general knowledge.

In the multiplayer mode of Chronology you can compare yourself to other players.

Chronology - Have fun testing your knowledge.

https://ak17apps.com/chronology.php
